body:
Listed French artist Louis-Robert de Cuvillon’s watercolors are very subtle and delicate. Many of his passionate works such as “Women with a Tambourine”, “Women in Exotic Dress”, and “Girl with a Fan” have been sold through such venues as Sotheby’s New York and Bonhams Los Angeles. This watercolor titled “Reclining Women with Bouquet” is framed in a fine period Art Nouveau scrolled frame.

H﻿igh auction record for this artist: $3,227.
dimensions: Watercolor, 8 x 10.5 inches / Signed and dated lower left
metaTitle: Louis-Robert de Cuvillon - Girl Holding Dove Painting
metaDescription: Louis-robert De Cuvillon, French Artist From 1848-1931 - Girl Holding Dove Watercolor Painting For Sale - 8x10.5 Inches - Signed And Dated Lower Left.
title: Girl Holding Dove
